title: What is Symbolism? - With Matthieu Pageau
description:
The first Pageau Brothers discussion.  We look at the basic tenets of what constitutes appropriate symbolic understanding and interpretation using examples from the Bible and from Christianity.  

Original discussion with Jordan Peterson: https://youtu.be/f3vqXCLhJLE

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings
